title: Namaste Bollywood
typeOfFood: Indian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Himalayan/Nepalese, Indian/Pakistani, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian and Nepalese restaurant with dedicated vegetarian entree and mains menus. Vegan dishes include entrees veg samosa, onion vaji, aalo tikki, veg pokara, and mains mixed vegetable curry, tadka daal, chana masala and aalo saag. Also vegan are plain rice, jeera rice and roti. Curries are cooked with vegetable oil not ghee. Be sure to advise staff you are vegan.
